1.title: What is staking
1.content: Staking is the process of storing and validating cryptocurrency in a blockchain to maintain the network operation and receive rewards.

2.title: How does it work?

3.title: What is API
3.content: API (Application Programming Interface) is a set of protocols and tools for creating software that allows different applications to interact with each other.

4.title: How is energy calculated
4.content: Energy is calculated based on various physical formulas, depending on the context. For example, in physics, energy can be calculated as the product of mass times the speed of light squared (E=mc²).

С правилами стейкинга ознакомлен: I have read the staking rules
1.1. Стейкинг осуществляется на платформ: 1.1. Staking is carried out on the EcoForce platform and allows users to freeze TRX tokens to receive energy and income.
1.2. Участие в стейкинге является добров: 1.2. Participation in staking is voluntary, and the user is responsible for understanding the associated risks.
1.3. Стейкинг регулируется настоящими ус: 1.3. Staking is regulated by these terms and rules, which the user accepts when adding tokens to staking.
2.1. Пользователь добавляет токены TRX в: 2.1. The user adds TRX tokens to staking through the personal account on the platform..
2.2. Замороженные токены TRX автоматичес: 2.2. Frozen TRX tokens automatically participate in the platform's general staking pool.
2.3. Энергия начисляется динамически и р: 2.3. Energy is credited dynamically and calculated based on the total amount of TRX in the Tron network staking.
Следим за изменением modelValue извне и: Monitoring modelValue change from outside and updating localValue

Для кого может быть полезен этот сервис: Who may find this service useful
Если вы регулярно отправляете USDT или д: If you regularly send USDT or other tokens in the Tron network, the service will help significantly reduce commission expenses, making transactions more profitable.
Даже небольшие вложения в стейкинг позво: Even small investments in staking will allow you to accumulate energy daily. You can use it to save on transactions or earn income by selling it back.
Для сервисов, обрабатывающих большой объ: For services processing a large volume of transactions in the Tron network, using energy through our service will reduce commission costs.
Онлайн-обменники могут арендовать энерги: Online exchangers can rent energy to optimize costs.
